extendedInfo.description: TrueCouponing.com is a Deal Website with thousands of readers all over the country. With our new app, you'll never miss a deal while you are on the go! Updated several times a day, you will gain instant access to all the deals, coupons, free offers and store sales right at your fingertips. **Create your Shopping List and check items off as you shop in the store!! **Know exactly how much you are about to spend before you even get into the checkout line! Features: ~See all recent posts from TrueCouponing.com...never miss a deal! ~Create your interactive shopping list and check off items as you shop in the store ~Be prepared for how much you are about to spend with the MyList feature! ~Scan the barcode on items (while in the store) and search all available coupons in the True Couponing Coupon Database ~Share your shopping trip savings with your friends on Facebook or Twitter ~Share your favorite Deal via Facebook, Pinterest, Twitter or Email ~Current stores covered are: Kroger, Winn Dixie, Whole Foods, Publix, Aldi, Albertsons, CVS, Walgreens, Rite Aid, Too many to list! If we do not cover your store, just email Save@TrueCouponing.com and help us add it to our site!

reviews.title: Freezes up on my LG
reviews.comment: Cant scroll due to freeze ups. I keep hitting the back button on my phone out of habbit and go out of the app. I can\'t use.
reviews.author: Susan Camp

reviews.title: Lags when scrolling
reviews.comment: If I try to make a list, it freezes and takes a really long time to scroll down.  It\'s too difficult to make a complete shopping list for this reason.  However, I like that you can get an actual total for your list, including coupons or not.  I wish the regular site had that feature.
reviews.author: Michelle G

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: The app frequently freezes and its impossible to make a shopping list
reviews.author: JenniLyn Conrad

reviews.title: Will not load
reviews.comment: I love the concept of the App, but it won\'t load. Every time I go to recent posts or freebies it gives me an error box that says it can\'t load content and to try again later. Please fix!! I love following Kati and Melisha!
reviews.author: Beth Donahue

reviews.title: Buttons don\'t work.
reviews.comment: Can\'t navigate the app because the buttons don\'t always work. I can spam the button and maybe it\'ll work, or maybe it won\'t...
reviews.author: Oscar Morejon

reviews.title: 1 star is to much....sorry katie
reviews.comment: Freezes. Please make it better. Uninstalling for now.
reviews.author: Shannon Schlangen

reviews.title: ooooomg
reviews.comment: way WAY to freaking slow wow!
reviews.author: nikole hendrickson

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: So it shows there is a coupon but where can I find it??
reviews.author: Nanci Sherman

reviews.title: Yay!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting on a True Couponing app! LOVE YOUR SITE AND APP!  Thanks for all you do!
reviews.author: Kathy Humphrey

reviews.title: Would be good if it work
reviews.comment: Lags, phone freezes up. waste of time.
reviews.author: Martin Labombard

reviews.title: Unistalled
reviews.comment: I kept for. A. Week. And. Nothing ever changed. No coupons ever showed up or any other deals so. I just. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: james karther

reviews.title: Definitely get it
reviews.comment: Great app.  Definitely saves time while in the store while trying to get the best deal.
reviews.author: Brandy Faircloth
